question: Tī 2018 nî, 'hòe-chí iōng-hòe hū-tōe siū-tńg ê siū-chek' kap 'pèⁿ-chiong chheh-chāi hòe-chí iōng-hòe siū-chek hū-tōe' chit nn̄g ê hū-tōe tiong, ūi-tiāⁿ ê hū-tōe sīna ê koh-khah tōa?
2017 nî ūi-hông ê choân-pō͘ʦê chè-sìn hāng-ba̍k ê chóng kè-ta̍t, kā 'tcja reserve on revenue' kap 'income taxes recovered through rates' lūi chāi lāi-bīn ê chāi gōa-khì, sī siáⁿ-mih?
Koa ē hō͘ 2017 kàu 2018 ê sî-chūn, ū tī hē chi̍t ê tiâu-bo̍k hō͘ pí-lu̍t siōng-koân tōa ê tâng-tâng? Chhiáⁿ kóng i ê pí-lu̍t tâng-tâng, ēng sió-sò͘ nn̄g ūi lâi kiâⁿ.

2017 kap 2018 niá chi-kan, hō͘ tōa kái-piàn siōng chió ê li-a-pi-li-ti bo̍k, che sī kiám-tōa ê pâi-chāi ? (chú-iàu sī khoàⁿ hō͘ chiàⁿ-tùi chioh-chè-liāu ê chîⁿ-sò͘ ê hō͘ kái-piàn ê pâi-chāi siōng chió)
Kui ê hū-chek lūi-hêng sī ū kám-kiám tùi 2017 kàu 2018 ê sî?
answer: pension and other postretirement benefit balancing accounts

question: 2018 ni 'total regulatory liabilities' tang lian, 'income taxes recovered through rates' chhòe hō͘ sîn-chē chha-put-to 370 kò͘? Kūn-chhiú kò͘ kàu siōng chhòe ê pau-phoè. (Chhòe hō͘ sîn-chē chha-put-to 67%)
Nāi kāu ê 'tcja reserve on revenue' nā-sī bē chhāⁿ chòe 2017 nî ê sêng-chí, chiah-ê sòe-liōng ê individual liabilities tī 2018 nî ē sī siám-me?
Kāi teh chu-liāu, kāi Tè-chè kah Ka-kang Hōe-tîm (TCJA) chòe hō͘ kong-si ê hū-chèin tī 2017 kah 2018 nî chi-kan ū siáⁿ-mi̍h chha-īⁿ-ê éng-hióng, ē-tàng chòe siáⁿ-mi̍h-ê thîⁿ-siat?
answer: Chū-liāu sī ēng lâi kóng-súi, TCJA ū chi̍t-ê chin tōa, tān-sī khó-lêng sī chi̍t-pái-sî ê chîⁿ-tâi éng-hióng. 'tcja reserve on revenue' ê só͘-chāi óa-ló͘ chin tōa, tùi 2017 nî ê $2014 kiám kah 2018 nî ê $36, kiám liáu 98% í-siōng. Che sī kóng-súi 2017 nî khui ê chi̍t-ê tōa só͘-chāi, khó-lêng kap chè-tō͘ ê tōa-tōa thàu-thiám, tī āu chi̍t nî chin tōa phòe-tō͘ bô-hoat-tō͘ sú-iōng, he̍k-sī tōa-tōa tîm-tō͘ tōa-tōa, chōe 2018 nî ê lián-chiu chi̍t-ê khòaⁿ-bīn kiám liáu chin tōa.

question: Tùi 2017 nî ê kok-chha kó͘-chiap hāng-mục (tē 1 kàu tē 6 hâng) ê chū-tāng chiap-sò͘, oán chū-sǹg ê chiap-sò͘ kap hit nî ê 'tota̍t kó͘-chiap che-bū' ê ta̍t chha-pia̍t.
Nai ê hāng-bo̍k tāi-piáu siáⁿ-mih ê chîⁿ-chè ê sió-tūi, in-ūi chha-īⁿ 2017 nî kah 2018 nî ê kè-ta̍t ū siāng-tōa ê kái-piàn?
Ùi 2017 kàu 2018, chiàⁿ hūi thè lâi ê chòe-gia̍h phòe-kàu siâu thun chē chē chē?
